properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued February 3 at 4:30AM EST until February 5 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a
Lakeshore Flood Advisory, which is in effect from 4 AM EST /3 AM
CST/ Tuesday to 7 AM EST /6 AM CST/ Wednesday.

* LAKE SHORE FLOODING AND BEACH EROSION...North to northeast winds
of 20 to 30 mph tonight into Wednesday morning will build waves
to 5 to 10 feet along the lakeshore.

* TIMING...Late tonight into Wednesday morning

* IMPACTS...High wind and wave action will cause beach erosion
and minor lakeshore flooding, particularly in LaPorte County and
southern Berrien County.
properties.instruction:
A Lakeshore Flood Advisory indicates that onshore winds will
generate beach erosion and minor flooding of low areas along the
lakeshore.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM EST /3 AM CST/ TUESDAY TO 7 AM EST /6 AM CST/ WEDNESDAY
